metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4524 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in lib/mhtxthtml.pl in MHonArc 2.6.16 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a malformed start tag and end tag for a SCRIPT element, as demonstrated by <scr<body>ipt> and </scr<body>ipt> sequences.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4524` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mhonarc - 2.6.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mhonarc package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.18-1').
